synopsis.text:
Negoro Botan, a young woman with a unique upbringing that blends the ancient art of ninjutsu with modern spycraft, is thrust into a high-stakes mission of global significance. Her objective? To retrieve the scattered fragments of genius inventor Nikola Tesla's legacy, the Tesla Shards. These shards, when assembled, hold the potential to unleash unparalleled power, making them a target for various clandestine organizations worldwide.

Teaming up with the boisterous and self-proclaimed top agent, Kuruma, Botan embarks on a thrilling journey riddled with international espionage and supernatural phenomena. As they race against time and formidable adversaries, the duo must outmaneuver rival agents, each with their own designs on the Tesla Shards.

Will Botan and Kuruma successfully retrieve all the shards before they fall into the wrong hands, or will the world crumble under the weight of Tesla's unleashed power? Join them in this original spy thriller as they navigate the treacherous path to save the world from impending doom.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
